mapper.update: UPDATE DIETS SET DIETS.NAME = #{name}, DIETS.FOOD1 = #{food1}, DIETS.FOOD2 = #{food2}, DIETS.FOOD3 = #{food3}, DIETS.FOOD4 = #{food4}, DIETS.FOOD5 = #{food5}, DIETS.DESCRIPTION = #{description}, DIETS.TASTE = #{taste}, DIETS.PRICE = #{price}, DIETS.PICTURE = #{picture} WHERE DIETS.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIETS (DIETS.NAME, DIETS.FOOD1, DIETS.FOOD2, DIETS.FOOD3, DIETS.FOOD4, DIETS.FOOD5, DIETS.DESCRIPTION, DIETS.TASTE, DIETS.PRICE, DIETS.PICTURE) VALUES (#{name}, #{food1}, #{food2}, #{food3}, #{food4}, #{food5}, #{description}, #{taste}, #{price}, #{picture})
mapper.select: SELECT ORDERDIET.DAY, ORDERDIET.CUSTID as customerId, ORDERDIET.BREKID as breakfastId, ORDERDIET.LUNCHID, ORDERDIET.DINNERID, ORDERDIET.DELSTATUS as deleteStatus FROM ORDERDIET WHERE ORDERDIET.CUSTID = #{customerId}
